title: Locked down in China's Xi'an amid coronavirus outbreak, residents subsist on deliveries of vegetables
content:
1. Locked down in China's Xi'an amid coronavirus outbreak, residents subsist on deliveries of vegetables  The Washington Post
  2. Officials promise groceries for Xi'an residents in lockdown  Associated Press
  3. Xian battles biggest COVID-19 outbreak by a Chinese city this year  Reuters
  4. Covid in China: Officials Renew Zero Tolerance Approach Despite Xi'an Outbreak  Bloomberg
  5. Chinese residents ‘starving’ as world’s strictest COVID lockdown bans them leaving home  New York Post

localize.title: コロナウイルス感染で閉鎖された中国西安で、配達される野菜で生活する住民たち
